Prompts.BasePrompt: Restructure this content into its Key Concepts. Under each Key Concept, provide a detailed explanation. Serve the response in Markdown format, use (#) to seperate the key concepts.
Prompts.BulletPrompt: Restructure this content into its Key Concepts. Under each Key Concept, provide a detailed explanation in bulleted form. Serve the response in Markdown format, use (#) to seperate the key concepts.
Prompts.ExamplePrompt: Restructure this content into its Key Concepts. Under each Key Concept, provide a detailed explanation provide examples where applicable. Serve the response in Markdown format, use (#) to seperate the key concepts.
Prompts.QuestionPrompt: Restructure this content into its Key Concepts. Under each Key Concept, provide a detailed explanation and provide a thoughtful question at the end. Serve the response in Markdown format, use (#) to seperate the key concepts.
